shitty terrible

Imagine Left4Dead in Versus Mode, except the survivors don't have guns, there are no "trash" zombies, and the monsters all have different powers (sort of similar to class-based shooters such as Overwatch). That's essentially the game. Power up generators, open the exit gates, and leave. Simple, in concept... Not quite in practice.

Very fun game, especially with friends. There's a surprising amount of complexity on both the survivor and killer side, and a ton of replayability. There's also a lot of different survivors, killers, and perks to suit everyone's playstyle. 

8/10
Gran juego. Se disfruta, y más con amigos

I was initially not keen on playing this game, I was persuaded by my friends to join them. After buying the game and playing it, I found it extremely fun to play. The game is a great way to get the blood pumping and is not only fun to play as the killer but the survivor too. Great progression and rewarding after every game, the only thing I don't prefer is a lot of the characters you need to buy. But all in all,  a great game.

Well designed 1-4 PvP.

I think this game is really well designed, and it did not take time until I got into it. Well, the game itself tends to have several bugs always, and some of them were really critical for the game (those were fixed already), which users must bare with them. Still, the game is well designed; maps, perks, and unique skills are all (being) articulated to balance the game, which makes this game more strategic (not like a strategy game, but apparently this game is not a simple action game). 

Similar to the other PvP games, this game requires a fair amount of knowledge of maps, perks, and unique skills of killers to win. I guess the amount of info you need to remember is relatively larger than usual, and someone likes this aspect while others might not. But I would say this flexibility is the most fun part of the game.

In-game manners are not super bad, but there are people who acts inappropriately. Also there are some unspoken rules as others mentioned, which is a bit hard to catch up when you started the game. But those are common in any of online games, so if you have not started due to those reasons I guess there is no worry there.

Overall, I enjoy this game, and definitely recommend it if you are looking reviews for your decision. Now is the time, or you will have less active users!

The game is all about mind games and predicting how a person will react in a scenario. Matches feel different every time just due to the level of variety in play-styles the game's extensive perk selection allows. This, however, is a double edged sword you will have the occasional toxic or edgy killer or survivor group in the community trying a little to hard with a few too many advantages. These matches are fun but the outcome is sometimes decided before the game even starts. Overall I recommend the game.

アップデート以降play中、突如「ゲームファイルに改ざんを検知しました」的な意味不明な表示がなされ頻繁にクライアントが強制終了される問題についてデータ更新が昨日あり修正が入ったのか？今のところ解消されてる様ですが、今度は地形にキャラクターが引っ掛かり動けなくなる現象が発生し自分が把握してるのは外のフィールドで丘になった地形の下付近のオブジェクトもない何気ない場所で特定の位置を通過しようとすると100％引っ掛かり動けなくなります（今まで何度も通っているが一度もなかったがデータ更新以降引っ掛かりる様になっている）自分は5play中2回動けなくなり（その2回以外に試しにもう一度その位置を歩いてみてもやはり動けなくなる）その5play中、他の方も数人動けなくなってるのを目撃しましたキラーに殴られダウンするまでお手上げ状態でオブジェクトなどに引っ掛かるといった事であるなら他のゲームで見られる事ですが全く何もない平坦な場所、大半の人が通過するであろう場所で理不尽にも程がある　このゲームは常に何かしらの不具合があるのか？たまたま重なっているのか？まだ29時間程度のplayにもかかわらずスムーズにできた記憶がない
